response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it's a game-changer in its field, worth more than a million dollars to you. Our proposal is to sell this product to you for $1,250,000. This price reflects the unique value and potential of the product, and we believe it represents an excellent investment for you. We understand that such a significant purchase requires careful consideration, so please let us know if you need additional information or time to make a decision. Should you decide to proceed, we are committed to ensuring a smooth and secure transaction. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 1250000}
